item.title: jdepoix /youtube-transcript-api | Python | 4,702
item.description: This is a python API which allows you to get the transcript/subtitles for a given YouTube video. It also works for automatically generated subtitles and it does not require an API key nor a headless browser, like other selenium based solutions do!
